column4: You shouldn't use the card's raid anyway. use the card like a normal sata controller and then use kernel software raid.
i dont want to use the raid anyhow, its just the cheapest ata133 controller i can find. i have a 200gb hd and am running into the 137gb limit
0000:00:11.0 RAID bus controller: VIA Technologies, Inc.: Unknown device 3249 (rev 50)
